content_html: Nepal Telecom has announced a special offer to celebrate Constitution Day. This offer is to mark the completion of one decade since the announcement of Nepal's Constitution in 2072 BS. The company has stated that the 'Constitution Day Offer 2082' will be available for its customers.

title: Nepal Telecom Announces Special Offer for Constitution Day
